Draft minutes of the Foothill-De Anza Community College District Financing Corporation Board of Directors meeting of December 10, 2012, attached.
items.item_recommendation: Recommend approval of the minutes of the December 10, 2012, Financing Corporation meeting.

items.item_details:
Background and Analysis:
	 
It has been determined that it is in the best interest of the District to refinance its outstanding Refunding Certificates of Participation (Series 2003) (the “2003 Certificates”) through the preparation, sale and delivery of a Lease/Purchase Agreement.
	 
Approval of the resolution is needed to permit the sale of a Lease/Purchase Agreement.
	 
The District would cause the execution and delivery of a Lease/Purchase Agreement (the “Lease”) to Capital One Public Funding, LLC, as the Purchaser of the Lease (the “Purchaser”).  The maximum amount authorized to be borrowed would be $8,500,000.  The Lease will carry a fixed interest rate of 1.75% for a term of eight years and save the District approximately $85,000 annually in interest expense as compared to the current terms.
	 
The resolution would approve the form of the Lease/Purchase Agreement, Site Lease and Assignment Agreement and authorize the President of the Board, the Chancellor, the Vice Chancellor, Business Services, and the Controller to take any and all actions necessary to consummate the sale, execution and delivery of the Lease.

Kevin McElroy, x6201
